summary: A woman finds a treasure and is torn between two men: one who wants to sell it and one who wants to gift it to Greece.
cast: Alan Ladd|Clifton Webb|Sophia Loren|Alexis Minotis|Jorge Mistral|Laurence Naismith|Piero Giagnoni|Gertrude Flynn|Charles Fawcett|Tonis Maroudas|Orestes Rallis|George Saris|Margaret Stahl|Charlotte Terrabust
title: La sirena y el delf√≠n
